Params: {3: "The courses you took at the military academy are finally paying off. You scour through the files for the medicinal sounding terms on that supplier's notebook."}
{3: '"Haelios solution. A form of vital fluid additive..."'}

{3: '"Has stimulative properties for the M.I.N.D. of a Construct. Maintains M.I.N.D. clarity through the amplification of sensory receptions, including, but not limited to pain, hearing, negative emotions, and..."'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "On the battlefield, I'm always the last one standing.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "I don't expect the other mongrels to be at my level. So to stop them from dragging me down, I'll have to make preparations.", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Liv', 3: "Let's see. It's essentially a sensory amplifying drug for Constructs. Through stimulating the sympathetic ganglia of the M.I.N.D., a Construct's sensory inputs can be amplified in a short amount of time.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'It amplifies mostly negative sensory information... Like pain, or emotional fluctuations—magnifying them several-fold.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'In a way, it does force a Construct conscious through pain... Anyhow, Haelios is deemed illegal by Babylonia.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'But what are you asking this for, Commandant...?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Ah! Commandant, did someone try to get something out of you with—', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Haelios solutions are only usable by Constructs, but you shouldn't mess with them still, Commandant!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'But that reminds me, though. Thank you, Commandant—for claiming the supplies in my stead.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Yeah... I don't know if you've heard, Commandant... But two squads have taken heavy casualties... Aside from the confirmed deaths, there are still many MIA...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Command seems to value the info from this operation greatly. But... the memory shells of the KIA members have all been destroyed—to an irrecoverable degree.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "I know I'm now under Gray Raven and frontline medical support isn't my duty, but I still...", 4: '1'}
{2: "You've been giving it your all, Liv.", 3: '42', 4: '...', 5: '42'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: '...Thanks for listening to me, Commandant. I feel better letting it out!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Ripping through the dark like a ray of light, Vera stands tall, casting her gaze downward.'}
{3: 'And another Vera, leaning on a parasol chair with a cup of shaved ice...'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: '...Spare the thanks. I just happened to have an adrenaline shot left.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: '...And, people I save—they rarely live long.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Well! I'll be taking my leave then! If you have any more questions, feel free to ask me.", 4: '1'}
